classmethod get_handler(handler_name: str) → Handler[source]

Gets handler with the given name.

Parameters:

handler.

Raises:

ItemNotFoundError – if no handler with the given name is found.

classmethod init_handlers(config: HandlersFactoryConfig) → None[source]

Initializes handlers for the given configuration by importing corresponding modules, objects and creating instances.

Parameters:

config – configuration of handlers.
